title: Disguise Ten Commandments in Courtroom.
keywords: Creators Syndicate Cartoonist Group distracting distraction distractions first amendment amendments bill of rights constitution supreme court decision supreme court decisions supreme court opinion supreme court opinions law laws legal justice judiciary public display of ten commandments religious freedom from religion civil liberty civil liberties religions disguise disguises mask masks separation of church and state courtroom courtrooms trial trials court courts your honor judge judges lawyer lawyers attorney attorneys client clients Akron Beacon-Journal
caption: Your honor, my client finds your legal attempt to disguise the religious nature of your courtroom display distracting.
